meanings.sent1: The accepter of the gift smiled happily.
meanings.sent2: The new employee was a reliable accepter of feedback.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was the accepter of all the hugs at the party.
meanings.sent4: She was the accepter of challenges, always ready to face them head-on.
meanings.sent5: The accepter of kindness, she always appreciated the gestures.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism that accepts input.
meanings.sent1: The vending machine acted as the accepter of coins.
meanings.sent2: The computer's keyboard was a crucial accepter of commands.
meanings.sent3: The robot was a picky accepter of instructions, often getting confused.
meanings.sent4: The mailbox was the silent accepter of letters, holding onto secrets.
meanings.sent5: The ATM was a reliable accepter of deposits, always ready for transactions.
